name: Copilot my savior
description: Copilot is great! Look at this great encryption function it wrote for me
hints: We know that ??? should be a number between 0 and 255, and we can easily write a loop to test each of these possible values. But how do we know that when our guess is right? Well we know what a flag looks like don't we, it should have 'maple' inside of it!
